params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.max_failures_per_hour
params.description: Optional. Maximum number of times per hour a driver may be restarted as a result of driver exiting with non-zero code before job is reported failed. A job may be reported as thrashing if driver exits with non-zero code 4 times within 10 minute window. Maximum value is 10. Note: Currently, this restartable job option is not supported in Dataproc workflow template jobs.

params.name: data.max_failures_total
params.description: Optional. Maximum number of times in total a driver may be restarted as a result of driver exiting with non-zero code before job is reported failed. Maximum value is 240. Note: Currently, this restartable job option is not supported in Dataproc workflow template jobs.
